summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account associated with the Butterfly Trust for the period of April 1 to April 30, 2019. It details various outgoing transfers to other banks and includes information about service charges and interest payments.

persons.name: Steuart Chiliad
persons.context: Steuart Chiliad is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing money transfers were made to various banks including Wells Fargo, JPMorgan Chase, and Barclays Bank.

events.title: Return of Wire Funds
events.description: A credit memo was issued for the return of wire funds paid in error.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust account at Deutsche Bank.
The account had an ending balance of $97,828.79 as of April 30, 2019.
There were multiple outgoing transfers totaling $130,000 to various banks during the month.
A credit memo was issued for $20,000 due to funds being paid in error.
Service charges and fees were noted, including a total of $50 in overdraft fees for the statement period.
